noun.definition: A zoot suit; a style of clothing characterized by high-waisted, wide-legged trousers and a long coat
noun.example: He wore a vintage zoot to the costume party.

verb.definition: To dress in a zoot suit or stylishly; to move quickly (slang)
verb.example: He was zooted up for the night out.

usage_examples: They zooted down the street in their new car.
